load_data.json_critique: Clear and complete; slightly more step-by-step guidance than necessary for an expert.
default_mtov.json_critique: Instructions restate large portions of the method and equations, providing far more detail than required to reproduce the calculation.
mtov_spin.json_critique: Over-specifies every modelling choice and procedure, duplicating paper content rather than just referencing it.
equal_mass_slope.json_critique: Redundant exposition of models, priors and equations leads to unnecessary length beyond what an expert needs.
mass_gap_constraint.json_critique: Includes an exhaustive, partially tutorial-style recipe that exceeds the information strictly needed to reproduce the result.
default_mbh.json_critique: Contains excessive reiteration of model components and priors already defined in the paper.
mass_gap.json_critique: Fully restates methodology; brevity could be achieved by referencing earlier tasks/paper sections.
spin_constraint.json_critique: Underspecified: ‘mock data setup’ and ‘default settings’ are not explicitly spelled out, leaving ambiguity about population, detector curve, and sampling details.
mtov_spin_2.json_critique: Reproduces long segments of the paper verbatim, supplying unnecessary instructional detail.
paper_critique: Tasks are generally precise but consistently over-verbose; one task (spin_constraint) lacks sufficient specification, preventing perfect reproducibility.
paper_title: Inferring the neutron star maximum mass and lower mass gap in neutron star--black hole systems with spin
